verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: slow] - [V: cooked] [ARG1: caribbean pot] roast i put this sweet potato recipe together throughout the fall and winter seasons but considering how simple the dish is to prepare anytime is a great time to enjoy it —jenn tidwell fair oaks california
